   391→/**
   392→ * Get regional cost data for a surgical treatment.
   393→ * Maps recommendation ref_id to SURGICAL_TREATMENTS database.
   394→ */
   395→function getRegionalCosts(refId: string, name: string): { region: string; min: number; max: number; currency: string; notes?: string }[] | null {
   396→  // Map ref_ids to surgery names in hardmaxxing.ts
   397→  const refToSurgery: Record<string, string> = {
   398→    'SUR-01': 'genioplasty',
   399→    'SUR-02': 'rhinoplasty_reduction',
   400→    'SUR-03': 'jaw_implants',
   401→    'SUR-04': 'bimax',
   402→    'SUR-05': 'canthoplasty',
   403→    'SUR-06': 'cheek_implants',
   404→    'SUR-07': 'buccal_fat_removal', // Neck Lipo maps to closest
   405→    'SUR-08': 'forehead_implant',
   406→  };
   407→
   408→  const surgeryId = refToSurgery[refId];
   409→  if (!surgeryId) {
   410→    // Try to find by name match
   411→    const surgery = SURGICAL_TREATMENTS.find(s =>
   412→      s.name.toLowerCase().includes(name.toLowerCase().split(' ')[0]) ||
   413→      name.toLowerCase().includes(s.name.toLowerCase().split(' ')[0])
   414→    );
   415→    return surgery?.regionalCosts || null;
   416→  }
   417→
   418→  const surgery = SURGICAL_TREATMENTS.find(s => s.id === surgeryId);
   419→  return surgery?.regionalCosts || null;
   420→}
   421→
   422→function getRelevantCitations(
   423→  procedureRefId: string,
   424→  gender?: Gender,
   425→  ethnicity?: Ethnicity
   426→): ResearchCitation[] {
   427→  // Calculate relevance score for sorting
   428→  function calculateRelevance(citation: ResearchCitation): number {
   429→    let score = 0;
   430→
   431→    // Base score: procedure is in the list
   432→    if (!citation.procedureRefs.includes(procedureRefId)) return -1;
   433→
   434→    // Procedure specificity: fewer refs = more specific to this procedure (+20 max)
   435→    score += Math.max(0, 20 - (citation.procedureRefs.length * 3));
   436→
   437→    // Gender relevance scoring
   438→    if (gender && citation.genderRelevance) {
   439→      if (citation.genderRelevance === gender) {
   440→        // Exact gender match - highest priority (+30)
   441→        score += 30;
   442→      } else if (citation.genderRelevance === 'both') {
   443→        // General/both - neutral (+10)
   444→        score += 10;
   445→      } else {
   446→        // Wrong gender - exclude
   447→        return -1;
   448→      }
   449→    } else {
   450→      // No gender specified or citation has no gender preference
   451→      score += 10;
   452→    }
   453→
   454→    // Ethnicity relevance scoring
   455→    if (ethnicity && ethnicity !== 'other' && citation.ethnicityRelevance) {
   456→      if (citation.ethnicityRelevance.includes(ethnicity)) {
   457→        // Exact ethnicity match - high priority (+25)
   458→        score += 25;
   459→        // Bonus for ethnicity-specific studies (fewer ethnicities = more focused)
   460→        score += Math.max(0, 15 - (citation.ethnicityRelevance.length * 2));
   461→      } else {
   462→        // Citation is ethnicity-specific but doesn't match user - lower priority
   463→        // Still include unless very specific (1-2 ethnicities)
   464→        if (citation.ethnicityRelevance.length <= 2) {
   465→          return -1; // Too specific for different ethnicity
   466→        }
   467→        score += 5; // General enough to still be useful
   468→      }
   469→    } else {
   470→      // No ethnicity filter or citation applies to all
   471→      score += 10;
   472→    }
   473→
   474→    // Recency bonus: newer studies slightly preferred
   475→    const yearBonus = Math.max(0, (citation.year - 2000) * 0.5);
   476→    score += yearBonus;
   477→
   478→    return score;
   479→  }
   480→
   481→  // Filter, score, sort, and take top 3
   482→  return RESEARCH_CITATIONS
   483→    .map(citation => ({ citation, relevance: calculateRelevance(citation) }))
   484→    .filter(item => item.relevance >= 0)
   485→    .sort((a, b) => b.relevance - a.relevance)
   486→    .slice(0, 3)
   487→    .map(item => item.citation);
   488→}
   489→
   490→// ============================================
   491→// PHASE BADGE (Dark Theme)
   492→// ============================================
   493→
   494→function PhaseBadge({ phase }: { phase: string }) {
   495→  const getPhaseConfig = () => {
   496→    switch (phase) {
   497→      case 'Foundational':
   498→        return {
   499→          bg: 'bg-emerald-500/20',
   500→          text: 'text-emerald-400',
   501→          border: 'border-emerald-500/30',
   502→        };
   503→      case 'Minimally Invasive':
   504→        return {
   505→          bg: 'bg-blue-500/20',
   506→          text: 'text-blue-400',
   507→          border: 'border-blue-500/30',
   508→        };
   509→      case 'Surgical':
   510→        return {
   511→          bg: 'bg-purple-500/20',
   512→          text: 'text-purple-400',
   513→          border: 'border-purple-500/30',
   514→        };
   515→      default:
   516→        return {
   517→          bg: 'bg-neutral-500/20',
   518→          text: 'text-neutral-400',
   519→          border: 'border-neutral-500/30',
   520→        };
   521→    }
   522→  };
   523→
   524→  const config = getPhaseConfig();
   525→
   526→  return (
   527→    <span
   528→      className={`text-[9px] sm:text-[10px] uppercase tracking-wide font-semibold px-1.5 sm:px-2 py-0.5 rounded-md border flex-shrink-0 ${config.bg} ${config.text} ${config.border}`}
   529→    >
   530→      {phase === 'Minimally Invasive' ? 'Non-Invasive' : phase}
   531→    </span>
   532→  );
   533→}
   534→
   535→// ============================================
   536→// IMPACT BADGE
   537→// ============================================
   538→
   539→function ImpactBadge({ impact, frontImpact, sideImpact }: { impact: number; frontImpact?: number; sideImpact?: number }) {
   540→  const formattedImpact = impact >= 0 ? `+${impact.toFixed(2)}` : impact.toFixed(2);
   541→
   542→  return (
   543→    <div className="flex items-center gap-1.5 sm:gap-2 flex-wrap">
   544→      <span className="flex items-center gap-1 text-[9px] sm:text-[10px] font-semibold text-emerald-400 bg-emerald-500/20 px-1.5 sm:px-2 py-0.5 rounded-md border border-emerald-500/30 flex-shrink-0">
   545→        <Sparkles className="w-2.5 h-2.5 sm:w-3 sm:h-3" />
   546→        {formattedImpact}
   547→      </span>
   548→      {(frontImpact !== undefined || sideImpact !== undefined) && (
   549→        <span className="hidden sm:flex items-center gap-1.5 text-[9px] text-neutral-500 flex-shrink-0">
   550→          <span className={`font-medium ${(frontImpact || 0) > 0 ? 'text-emerald-400' : 'text-neutral-500'}`}>
   551→            F {(frontImpact || 0) >= 0 ? '+' : ''}{(frontImpact || 0).toFixed(2)}
   552→          </span>
   553→          <span className="text-neutral-600">|</span>
   554→          <span className={`font-medium ${(sideImpact || 0) > 0 ? 'text-emerald-400' : 'text-neutral-500'}`}>
   555→            S {(sideImpact || 0) >= 0 ? '+' : ''}{(sideImpact || 0).toFixed(2)}
   556→          </span>
   557→        </span>
   558→      )}
   559→    </div>
   560→  );
   561→}
   562→
   563→// ============================================
   564→// IMPROVEMENT TAG
   565→// ============================================
   566→
   567→function ImprovementTag({ text }: { text: string }) {
   568→  return (
   569→    <div className="inline-flex items-center gap-1 sm:gap-1.5 px-2 sm:px-2.5 py-0.5 sm:py-1 bg-neutral-800 border border-neutral-700 rounded-md text-[11px] sm:text-xs font-medium text-neutral-300 shadow-sm">
   570→      <CheckCircle className="w-2.5 h-2.5 sm:w-3 sm:h-3 text-emerald-400 flex-shrink-0" />
   571→      <span className="truncate">{text}</span>
   572→    </div>
   573→  );
   574→}
   575→
   576→// ============================================
   577→// SECTION HEADER
   578→// ============================================
   579→
   580→function SectionHeader({ icon: Icon, title }: { icon: React.ElementType; title: string }) {
   581→  return (
   582→    <h4 className="flex items-center gap-1.5 sm:gap-2 text-[11px] sm:text-xs font-semibold text-white uppercase tracking-wide mb-2 sm:mb-3">
   583→      <Icon className="w-3 h-3 sm:w-3.5 sm:h-3.5 text-neutral-400" />
   584→      {title}
   585→    </h4>
   586→  );
   587→}
   588→
   589→// ============================================
   590→// MAIN ENHANCED RECOMMENDATION CARD
   591→// ============================================
   592→
   593→export function EnhancedRecommendationCard({
   594→  recommendation,
   595→  isExpanded = false,
   596→  onToggle,
   597→  // eslint-disable-next-line @typescript-eslint/no-unused-vars
   598→  rank,
   599→  onMarkComplete,
   600→  onRemove,
   601→  isCompleted = false,
   602→  gender,
   603→  ethnicity,
   604→}: EnhancedRecommendationCardProps) {
   605→  // Get relevant research citations based on procedure, gender, and ethnicity
   606→  const citations = useMemo(() => {
   607→    return getRelevantCitations(recommendation.ref_id, gender, ethnicity);
   608→  }, [recommendation.ref_id, gender, ethnicity]);
   609→
   610→  // Get regional costs for surgical treatments
   611→  const regionalCosts = useMemo(() => {
   612→    if (recommendation.phase !== 'Surgical') return null;
   613→    return getRegionalCosts(recommendation.ref_id, recommendation.name);
   614→  }, [recommendation.ref_id, recommendation.name, recommendation.phase]);
   615→
   616→  // Format cost
   617→  const formatCost = () => {
   618→    const { min, max, type } = recommendation.cost;
   619→    const typeLabel = type === 'per_session' ? 'session' : type === 'per_month' ? '/mo' : '';
   620→    if (min === max) {
   621→      return `$${min.toLocaleString()}${typeLabel ? ` ${typeLabel}` : ''}`;
   622→    }
   623→    return `$${min.toLocaleString()} - $${max.toLocaleString()}${typeLabel ? ` ${typeLabel}` : ''}`;
   624→  };
   625→
   626→  // Format timeline
   627→  const formatTimeline = () => {
   628→    const { full_results_weeks, full_results_weeks_max } = recommendation.timeline;
   629→    if (full_results_weeks_max) {
   630→      return `${full_results_weeks}-${full_results_weeks_max} weeks`;
   631→    }
   632→    if (full_results_weeks >= 52) {
   633→      const months = Math.round(full_results_weeks / 4);
   634→      return `${months} months`;
   635→    }
   636→    return `${full_results_weeks} weeks`;
   637→  };
   638→
   639→  // Get effectiveness level
   640→  const getEffectiveness = () => {
   641→    if (recommendation.impact >= 0.7) return 'high';
   642→    if (recommendation.impact >= 0.4) return 'moderate';
   643→    return 'low';
   644→  };
   645→
   646→  return (
   647→    <motion.div
   648→      layout
   649→      className={`bg-neutral-900/80 rounded-xl border group relative transition-all duration-150 ${
   650→        isExpanded
   651→          ? 'border-cyan-500/40 ring-1 ring-cyan-500/20'
   652→          : 'border-neutral-800 hover:border-neutral-700'
   653→      } ${isCompleted ? 'opacity-60' : ''}`}
   654→    >
   655→      {/* Header - Clickable */}
   656→      <div className="p-3.5 sm:p-5 cursor-pointer" onClick={onToggle}>
   657→        <div className="space-y-3 sm:space-y-4">
   658→          <div className="flex flex-col sm:flex-row sm:justify-between sm:items-start gap-3 sm:gap-4">
   659→            <div className="flex-1 min-w-0">
   660→              <div className="flex flex-col sm:flex-row sm:items-center gap-2 sm:gap-3 mb-2">
   661→                <h3 className="text-sm sm:text-base font-semibold transition-colors line-clamp-2 sm:truncate text-white">
   662→                  {recommendation.name}
   663→                </h3>
   664→                <div className="flex items-center gap-1.5 sm:gap-2 flex-wrap">
   665→                  <PhaseBadge phase={recommendation.phase} />
   666→                  <ImpactBadge impact={recommendation.impact} />
   667→                </div>
   668→              </div>
   669→              <p className="text-xs sm:text-sm text-neutral-400 leading-relaxed max-w-2xl line-clamp-2 sm:line-clamp-none">
   670→                {recommendation.description}
   671→              </p>
   672→            </div>
   673→
   674→            {/* Action buttons */}
   675→            <div className="flex items-center gap-1.5 sm:ml-4 absolute right-3 top-3 sm:relative sm:right-auto sm:top-auto">
   676→              {onMarkComplete && (
   677→                <button
   678→                  onClick={(e) => {
   679→                    e.stopPropagation();
   680→                    onMarkComplete(recommendation.ref_id);
   681→                  }}
   682→                  className={`p-1.5 sm:p-1.5 rounded-md border transition-colors ${
   683→                    isCompleted
   684→                      ? 'bg-emerald-500/20 text-emerald-400 border-emerald-500/30'
   685→                      : 'bg-neutral-900 text-neutral-500 border-neutral-700 hover:border-neutral-500 hover:text-white'
   686→                  }`}
   687→                  title="Mark as complete"
   688→                >
   689→                  <CheckCircle className="w-4 h-4" />
   690→                </button>
   691→              )}
   692→              {onRemove && (
   693→                <button
   694→                  onClick={(e) => {
   695→                    e.stopPropagation();
   696→                    onRemove(recommendation.ref_id);
   697→                  }}
   698→                  className="p-1.5 sm:p-1.5 rounded-md border transition-all duration-200 border-neutral-700 bg-neutral-900 text-neutral-500 hover:border-red-500/50 hover:text-red-400 hover:bg-red-500/10"
   699→                  title="Remove action"
   700→                >
   701→                  <Trash2 className="w-4 h-4" />
   702→                </button>
   703→              )}
   704→            </div>
   705→          </div>
   706→
   707→          {/* Quick stats row */}
   708→          <div className="flex flex-wrap items-center justify-between gap-x-4 sm:gap-x-6 gap-y-2 text-[11px] sm:text-xs text-neutral-400">
   709→            <div className="flex flex-wrap items-center gap-x-3 sm:gap-x-6 gap-y-1.5">
   710→              <div className="flex items-center gap-1 sm:gap-1.5" title="Estimated Cost">
   711→                <DollarSign className="w-3 h-3 sm:w-3.5 sm:h-3.5 text-neutral-500" />
   712→                <span className="font-medium text-neutral-300">{formatCost()}</span>
   713→              </div>
   714→              {recommendation.timeline.full_results_weeks > 0 && (
   715→                <div className="flex items-center gap-1 sm:gap-1.5">
   716→                  <Clock className="w-3 h-3 sm:w-3.5 sm:h-3.5 text-neutral-500" />
   717→                  <span className="font-medium text-neutral-300">{formatTimeline()}</span>
   718→                </div>
   719→              )}
   720→            </div>
   721→            <button
   722→              className="flex items-center gap-1 text-[11px] sm:text-xs font-medium transition-colors px-1.5 sm:px-2 py-1 rounded-md hover:bg-neutral-800 text-white"
   723→            >
   724→              {isExpanded ? 'Less' : 'More'}
   725→              <ChevronDown
   726→                className={`w-3 h-3 sm:w-3.5 sm:h-3.5 transition-transform ${isExpanded ? 'rotate-180' : ''}`}
   727→              />
   728→            </button>
   729→          </div>
   730→        </div>
   731→      </div>
   732→
   733→      {/* Expanded Content */}
   734→      <AnimatePresence initial={false}>
   735→        {isExpanded && (
   736→          <motion.div
   737→            initial={{ height: 0, opacity: 0 }}
   738→            animate={{ height: 'auto', opacity: 1 }}
   739→            exit={{ height: 0, opacity: 0 }}
   740→            transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}
   741→            className="overflow-hidden"
   742→          >
   743→            <div className="border-t border-neutral-800 bg-neutral-900/50">
   744→              <div className="p-4 sm:p-6 space-y-4 sm:space-y-6">
   745→                {/* Improvements - Limited to 3 */}
   746→                <div>
   747→                  <SectionHeader icon={Target} title="Improvements" />
   748→                  <div className="space-y-2 sm:space-y-3">
   749→                    <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-1.5 sm:gap-2">
   750→                      {recommendation.matchedFlaws.slice(0, 3).map((flaw, i) => (
   751→                        <ImprovementTag key={i} text={flaw} />
   752→                      ))}
   753→                      {recommendation.matchedFlaws.length === 0 && recommendation.matchedRatios.slice(0, 3).map((ratio, i) => (
   754→                        <ImprovementTag key={i} text={ratio} />
   755→                      ))}
   756→                    </div>
   757→                    <div className="bg-neutral-800/50 p-2.5 sm:p-3.5 rounded-lg border border-neutral-700 text-sm shadow-sm">
   758→                      <div className="flex items-center gap-2 mb-1.5 sm:mb-2">
   759→                        <div className="text-[10px] sm:text-xs font-semibold text-neutral-500 uppercase">Effectiveness</div>
   760→                        <div className="h-1 w-1 rounded-full bg-neutral-600" />
   761→                        <div className="font-medium text-white capitalize text-xs sm:text-sm">{getEffectiveness()}</div>
   762→                      </div>
   763→                    </div>
   764→                  </div>
   765→                </div>
   766→
   767→                  {/* How It Helps */}
   768→                  <div>
   769→                    <SectionHeader icon={Info} title="How It Helps" />
   770→                    <div className="space-y-1.5 sm:space-y-2">
   771→                      <div className="bg-neutral-800/50 p-2.5 sm:p-3.5 rounded-lg border border-neutral-700 text-sm shadow-sm">
   772→                        <p className="text-neutral-300 text-[11px] sm:text-xs leading-relaxed">
   773→                          {recommendation.description}
   774→                        </p>
   775→                      </div>
   776→                      {recommendation.ratios_impacted.length > 0 && (
   777→                        <div className="bg-neutral-800/50 p-2.5 sm:p-3.5 rounded-lg border border-neutral-700 text-sm shadow-sm">
   778→                          <p className="text-neutral-300 text-[11px] sm:text-xs leading-relaxed">
   779→                            This treatment can {recommendation.ratios_impacted[0].direction === 'increase' ? 'increase' : 'improve'}{' '}
   780→                            {recommendation.ratios_impacted.slice(0, 3).map(r => r.ratioName).join(', ')}.
   781→                          </p>
   782→                        </div>
   783→                      )}
   784→                    </div>
   785→                  </div>
   786→
   787→                  {/* Logistics & Timeline */}
   788→                  {recommendation.timeline.full_results_weeks > 0 && (
   789→                    <div>
   790→                      <SectionHeader icon={Clock} title="Logistics & Timeline" />
   791→                      <div className="grid grid-cols-2 gap-2 sm:gap-3">
   792→                        <div className="bg-neutral-800/50 p-2 sm:p-3 rounded-lg border border-neutral-700">
   793→                          <span className="text-[9px] sm:text-[10px] font-semibold text-neutral-500 uppercase block mb-0.5 sm:mb-1">
   794→                            Effect Starts
   795→                          </span>
   796→                          <span className="text-xs sm:text-sm font-medium text-white capitalize">
   797→                            {recommendation.timeline.effect_start}
   798→                          </span>
   799→                        </div>
   800→                        <div className="bg-neutral-800/50 p-2 sm:p-3 rounded-lg border border-neutral-700">
   801→                          <span className="text-[9px] sm:text-[10px] font-semibold text-neutral-500 uppercase block mb-0.5 sm:mb-1">
   802→                            Full Results
   803→                          </span>
   804→                          <span className="text-xs sm:text-sm font-medium text-white">
   805→                            {formatTimeline()}
   806→                          </span>
   807→                        </div>
   808→                      </div>
   809→                    </div>
   810→                  )}
   811→
   812→                  {/* Considerations */}
   813→                  <div>
   814→                    <SectionHeader icon={AlertTriangle} title="Considerations" />
   815→                    <div className="space-y-2 sm:space-y-3">
   816→                      {/* Prerequisites */}
   817→                      {recommendation.warnings.length > 0 && (
   818→                        <div className="bg-blue-500/10 p-2.5 sm:p-3.5 rounded-lg border border-blue-500/30 text-sm">
   819→                          <span className="font-semibold text-blue-400 block mb-0.5 sm:mb-1 text-xs sm:text-sm">Prerequisites</span>
   820→                          <p className="text-blue-300/80 text-[11px] sm:text-xs leading-relaxed">
   821→                            {recommendation.warnings[0]}
   822→                          </p>
   823→                        </div>
   824→                      )}
   825→
   826→                      {/* Risks & Side Effects */}
   827→                      {recommendation.risks_side_effects && (
   828→                        <div className="bg-amber-500/10 p-2.5 sm:p-3.5 rounded-lg border border-amber-500/30 text-sm">
   829→                          <span className="font-semibold text-amber-400 block mb-0.5 sm:mb-1 text-xs sm:text-sm">
   830→                            Risks & Side Effects
   831→                          </span>
   832→                          <p className="text-amber-300/80 text-[11px] sm:text-xs leading-relaxed">
   833→                            {recommendation.risks_side_effects}
   834→                          </p>
   835→                        </div>
   836→                      )}
   837→                    </div>
   838→                  </div>
   839→
   840→                  {/* Notes & Warnings */}
   841→                  {recommendation.warnings.length > 1 && (
   842→                    <div className="text-[11px] sm:text-xs text-neutral-400 bg-neutral-800/50 p-2.5 sm:p-3 rounded-lg border border-neutral-700 italic">
   843→                      {recommendation.warnings.slice(1).join(' ')}
   844→                    </div>
   845→                  )}
   846→
   847→                  {/* Research Citations */}
   848→                  <div className="bg-cyan-500/10 p-3 sm:p-4 rounded-lg border border-cyan-500/30">
   849→                    <div className="flex items-center gap-2 mb-3">
   850→                      <BookOpen size={14} className="text-cyan-400" />
   851→                      <span className="font-semibold text-cyan-400 text-xs sm:text-sm">Research & Evidence</span>
   852→                      {ethnicity && ethnicity !== 'other' && (
   853→                        <span className="text-[9px] px-1.5 py-0.5 bg-cyan-500/20 rounded text-cyan-300 capitalize">
   854→                          {ethnicity.replace('_', ' ')} focus
   855→                        </span>
   856→                      )}
   857→                    </div>
   858→                    {citations.length > 0 ? (
   859→                      <div className="space-y-2.5">
   860→                        {citations.map((citation, idx) => (
   861→                          <div key={idx} className="text-[11px] sm:text-xs bg-neutral-900/50 p-2.5 rounded-lg border border-neutral-700/50">
   862→                            <div className="flex items-start justify-between gap-2">
   863→                              <div className="flex-1">
   864→                                <div className="font-medium text-cyan-300 mb-0.5 line-clamp-2">
   865→                                  {citation.title}
   866→                                </div>
   867→                                <div className="text-neutral-500 text-[10px] mb-1">
   868→                                  {citation.authors} • {citation.journal} ({citation.year})
   869→                                </div>
   870→                                <div className="text-neutral-400 leading-relaxed">
   871→                                  {citation.summary}
   872→                                </div>
   873→                              </div>
   874→                              {citation.doi && (
   875→                                <a
   876→                                  href={`https://doi.org/${citation.doi}`}
   877→                                  target="_blank"
   878→                                  rel="noopener noreferrer"
   879→                                  className="flex-shrink-0 p-1 text-cyan-400 hover:text-cyan-300 transition-colors"
   880→                                  title="View full paper"
   881→                                >
   882→                                  <ExternalLink size={12} />
   883→                                </a>
   884→                              )}
   885→                            </div>
   886→                          </div>
   887→                        ))}
   888→                      </div>
   889→                    ) : (
   890→                      <div className="text-[11px] sm:text-xs text-cyan-300/70">
   891→                        {recommendation.matchedFlaws.length > 0
   892→                          ? 'Based on facial analysis and established aesthetic research. More specific citations coming soon.'
   893→                          : 'No specific research citations available for this recommendation.'}
   894→                      </div>
   895→                    )}
   896→                  </div>
   897→
   898→                  {/* Regional Costs for Surgical Treatments */}
   899→                  {regionalCosts && regionalCosts.length > 0 && (
   900→                    <div className="bg-purple-500/10 p-3 sm:p-4 rounded-lg border border-purple-500/30">
   901→                      <div className="flex items-center gap-2 mb-3">
   902→                        <Globe size={14} className="text-purple-400" />
   903→                        <span className="font-semibold text-purple-400 text-xs sm:text-sm">Medical Tourism Costs</span>
   904→                      </div>
   905→                      <div className="grid grid-cols-2 sm:grid-cols-3 gap-2">
   906→                        {regionalCosts.slice(0, 6).map((cost, idx) => (
   907→                          <div key={idx} className="bg-neutral-900/50 p-2 rounded-lg border border-neutral-700/50">
   908→                            <div className="flex items-center gap-1 mb-1">
   909→                              <MapPin size={10} className="text-purple-400" />
   910→                              <span className="text-[10px] font-semibold text-white">{cost.region}</span>
   911→                            </div>
   912→                            <div className="text-[11px] text-purple-300 font-medium">
   913→                              {cost.currency === 'USD' ? '$' : cost.currency === 'GBP' ? '£' : '€'}
   914→                              {cost.min.toLocaleString()} - {cost.max.toLocaleString()}
   915→                            </div>
   916→                            {cost.notes && (
   917→                              <div className="text-[9px] text-neutral-500 mt-0.5 line-clamp-1">
   918→                                {cost.notes}
   919→                              </div>
   920→                            )}
   921→                          </div>
   922→                        ))}

content.text:
## Summary

I have successfully implemented the `riskPercentage` field for FaceIQ parity. Here is what was done:

### Files Modified:

1. **`/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/lib/recommendations/types.ts`**
   - Added optional `riskPercentage?: number` field to `Treatment` interface (line 79)
   - Added optional `riskPercentage?: number` field to `Supplement` interface (line 147)
   - Added `RISK_LEVEL_TO_PERCENTAGE` mapping constant (lines 296-303):
     - 'none' -> 0%
     - 'very_low' -> 5%
     - 'low' -> 12%
     - 'medium' -> 28%
     - 'high' -> 45%
     - 'very_high' -> 55%
   - Added `getRiskPercentage()` helper function (lines 308-313) that returns explicit riskPercentage if set, otherwise derives from riskLevel

2. **`/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/lib/recommendations/hardmaxxing.ts`**
   - Added explicit `riskPercentage` values to all 25 surgical treatments:
     - Rhinoplasty: 28%
     - Tip Rhinoplasty: 15%
     - Septorhinoplasty: 25%
     - Genioplasty: 25%
     - Chin Implant: 18%
     - Jaw Implants: 30%
     - Mandibular Osteotomy: 42%
     - Bimax: 48%
     - V-Line Surgery: 28%
     - Cheek Implants: 28%
     - Zygomatic Reduction: 30%
     - LeFort I: 32%
     - Canthoplasty: 28%
     - Upper Blepharoplasty: 12%
     - Lower Blepharoplasty: 15%
     - Infraorbital Implants: 30%
     - Brow Lift: 18%
     - Hairline Lowering: 15%
     - Forehead Implant: 28%
     - Lip Lift: 15%
     - Lip Reduction: 12%
     - Buccal Fat Removal: 15%
     - Hair Transplant: 12%
     - Otoplasty: 10%
     - Fat Grafting: 18%

3. **`/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/lib/recommendations/softmaxxing.ts`**
   - Added `riskPercentage` values to lifestyle/softmaxxing treatments including sunscreen (2%), tretinoin (12%), mewing (5%), body recomposition (5%), etc.

4. **`/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/lib/recommendations/nonSurgical.ts`**
   - Added `riskPercentage` values to lip filler (12%) and chin filler (12%)

5. **`/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/components/results/shared/index.tsx`**
   - Added new `RiskPercentageBadge` UI component (lines 295-351) with:
     - Color-coded risk levels (green/blue/yellow/orange/red)
     - Optional progress bar visualization
     - Three sizes (sm/md/lg)

### How It Works:
- Treatments can specify an explicit `riskPercentage` value (0-60 range)
- If not provided, the `getRiskPercentage()` function derives it from `riskLevel`
- The UI component `RiskPercentageBadge` provides consistent visual display
- Backwards compatible - existing code using `riskLevel` continues to work

### Verification:
- `npm run lint` passes with only pre-existing warnings
- `npx tsc --noEmit` passes with no errors
